reviewText: Probably the last good theatrical film Lana Turner starred in before doing her last theatrical film.  Great story with wonderful actors in a style no longer seen in theatrical films today.  Yes, it's a soap opera, but a good one with one of the brightest and most glamorous stars from the golden age of Hollywood (Yes, she wears her fur coat with a scarf in this film).  Do not miss it, even though if it is hard to find on any TV or cable channel.  If you are a Lana Turner fan, you must see it!  Please put this film on DVD.
I remember seeing this movie back in the 70s on HBO and loving it. Loved Meredith Baxter to begin with and Lana Turner. Would love to see it on DVD.
Proving she still had her starpower in the 1970's Lana Turner starred in this fine film. I remember seeing this in the theatre. Soap opera to be sure but of the good kind.
Most interesting and featuring a beautiful, wonderful star--Lana Turner! She shows expertly versatility in style and abilities! A talent, sorely missed.
